item.title: EuroPi - Trigger to Gate
item.description: Trigger to Gate Script for EuroPi This script allows you to convert trigger into a gate signal. See this explanation on the difference between gates and triggers. What is a EuroPi? The EuroPi Module is a Eurorack module that allows you to control your modular synthesizer with a Raspberry Pi. You build it yourself using the information at https://github.com/Allen-Synthesis/EuroPi Trigger to Gate Generates a gate on cv1 in response to a trigger on din.

item.title: EuroPi - Utility Classes
item.description: Script Utils for EuroPi The Trigger to Gate script uses some utility functions that might be useful for other EuroPi scripts: KnobWithHysteresis KnobWithPassThrough Scheduler Rather than each script inventing its own hyseresis mitigation and knob pass-through logic, I have created these utility classes to be used by any EuroPi script that needs them. The problems: Pass-through knob values Because the knobs are used in two different modes, we run into the problem of the physical knob position not matching the value when you switch between modes.
